attributes.action: implement meaningful measures to improve energy efficiency, instead of 'Jump on the Band-wagon' taxes.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
If the Government is actually serious about 'Climate Change' (if it's even happening) then handing out taxes left, right and centre to get votes needs to be replaced by measures that are going to make a REAL difference. 
e.g. Bio-fuels (existing engine technology can be adapted)and increasing efficiency in the aviation and shipping industries etc.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
